title: Inception
description: A thief who enters dreams to steal secrets.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker in Gotham City.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen intertwine in Los Angeles.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the truth about his reality.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A simple man witnesses defining historical moments in America.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac and a soap maker form an underground fight club.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Godfather Part II
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone is portrayed while his son expands the crime family.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must unite to stop an alien invasion.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl enters a world of spirits to save her parents.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion cub prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility.

title: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian descends into nihilism and crime.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer enrolls in a cut-throat music conservatory.

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in a bitter rivalry.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor.

title: Up
description: An old man ties thousands of balloons to his house to travel to South America.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is threatened by the arrival of a space ranger toy.
